document.full_text: a federal appeals court in st. louis granted the owners' request to temporarily put on hold u.s. district judge susan nelson's ruling that lifted the lockout.
document.title: ruling could return n.f.l. to lockout
lines_and_colors: a federal appeals court in st. louis granted the owners' request to temporarily put on hold u.s. district judge susan nelson's ruling that lifted the lockout.
